data.description: Best opportunity to live in town!! Immediate occupancy available. Move right in to this easy living, wonderful Condo alternative. Fabulous turn-key 4BR saltbox with handsome hardwood floors, crown molding & updates throughout. Living Room features gas fireplace and built-ins, as well as large windows. Home Office/Den with built-in shelving opens to Dining Room w/ pocket french doors. Kitchen features newer stainless steel appliances & granite counters w/ample cabinets. Large Primary Suite includes Sitting Room, 2 walk-in closets & spacious Bath w/glass shower & double vanities. 2 additional spacious Bedrooms on second floor plus Full Bath and Laundry. Third floor has large Bedroom w/double closets, Full Bath & spacious Bonus Rm - perfect as an in-law or au pair suite! Additional Playroom in lower level. Large deck opens to level yard w/trees, planting beds & invisible fence. Town water & sewer. New propane furnace and AC units, new dishwasher, property regraded, exterior painted since purchase. Perfect Village living and best location in Connecticut's first Cultural District including The Ridgefield Playhouse, ACT of CT, Aldrich Contemporary Art Gallery, The Prospector movie theatre, Theatre Barn, Keeler Tavern and so much more. 5-star restaurants, boutique shopping, top-rated schools and great commute to NYC. All this AND the quintessential white picket fence! Great investment opportunity - excellent rental property! Must see!
